Autoloader is a PSR0-compatible autoloader.

entry.title: CliEngine 1.0.0 (stable)
entry.content:
CliEngine is a generic engine that makes it very quick and easy to create command-line tools in PHP
No notes.

entry.title: CommandLineLib 2.0.2 (stable)
entry.content:
CommandLineLib is a simple-to-use PHP component that provides a high-quality command line parser via a fluid interface.
No notes.

entry.title: ComponentManager 2.1.0 (stable)
entry.content:
ComponentManager allows you to create and maintain a variety of components, such as PHP libraries and Docbooks.

entry.content:

entry.title: ContractLib 2.1.0 (stable)
entry.content:
ContractLib is a lightweight PHP library designed to help you write more robust PHP components by helping your components enforce programming contracts throughout your code.
No notes.

entry.title: ExceptionsLib 1.1.2 (stable)
entry.content:
ExceptionsLib is an easy-to-use component to help you standardise your approach to PHP error handling, and to make it easy to deal with legacy PHP4-style errors.
No notes.

entry.title: PhpInfo 1.0.0 (stable)
entry.content:
A simple PHP component to demonstrate what happens when you ship web pages inside a PHP component.
No notes.

entry.title: TasksLib 1.3.1 (stable)
entry.content:
TasksLib is a simple-to-use PHP component that provides a collection of classes that automate common repetitive tasks. It was originally created to stop individual Phix commands duplicating code, but it's generic enough to be useful to a wider range of projects.
No notes.

entry.title: phix 1.0.0 (stable)

entry.title: phix4componentdev 0.16.0 (stable)
entry.content:
phix4componentdev is a meta-package that installs phix itself, plus all of the phix extensions required for creating and maintaining PHP components, plus all of the third-party tools you'll need to use.
No notes.
